dl.dd: Type: one of the values below

Indicates where keyboard navigation events are listened to. If this attribute is not specified, events are listened to from the template.XULElem("tabbox"). Thus, if this attribute is not used, the template.XULElem("tabbox") or an element inside it must have the focus for the keyboard navigation to apply.

ul.li: parent: Keyboard navigation is captured at the parent of the template.XULElem("tabbox").
window: Keyboard navigation is captured at the window level. Tab navigation will occur as long as any element in the window is focused.
document: Keyboard navigation is captured at the document level. Tab navigation will occur as long as any element in the document is focused.
